Recipes-Tracker, View

  • Personal Website for Recipes which allows customers to see all available products.

  • Build with JavaScript HTML5 & CSS3

  • Realized catalog page and designed the logic to allow the user to filter their searches.

  • Use of Fetch API to get the data.

Weather App, View

  • Responsive app created using JavaScript, HTML & CSS.

  • Implemented the AJAX call that retrieves data from the OpenWeather API.
